78 void writeFile( pcl::registration::TransformationEstimationSVD<pcl::PointXYZ,pcl::PointXYZ>::Matrix4 transformation ,const char* name)
79 {
80  FILE* pFile = fopen(name, "a");
81  fprintf(pFile, "%F;%F;%F;%F\n ", transformation(0,0),transformation(0,1),transformation(0,2),transformation(0,3));
82  fprintf(pFile, "%F;%F;%F;%F\n ", transformation(1,0),transformation(1,1),transformation(1,2),transformation(1,3));
83  fprintf(pFile, "%F;%F;%F;%F\n ", transformation(2,0),transformation(2,1),transformation(2,2),transformation(2,3));
84  fclose(pFile);
85 }
86 
95 void estimateTransformation(geometry_msgs::Pose & laser,pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> target_laserCloud, pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> & laserCloud, const char* laserNames)
96 {
97  //Eigen::Matrix4d transformation of laser lms151 to ldmrs
98  pcl::registration::TransformationEstimationSVD<pcl::PointXYZ,pcl::PointXYZ> TESVD;
99  pcl::registration::TransformationEstimationSVD<pcl::PointXYZ,pcl::PointXYZ>::Matrix4 transformation;
100  TESVD.estimateRigidTransformation (laserCloud,target_laserCloud,transformation);
101  cout<<transformation<<endl;
102 
103  MatrixXd Trans(4,4);
104  Trans<<transformation(0,0), transformation(0,1), transformation(0,2), transformation(0,3),
105  transformation(1,0), transformation(1,1), transformation(1,2), transformation(1,3),
106  transformation(2,0), transformation(2,1), transformation(2,2), transformation(2,3),
107  transformation(3,0), transformation(3,1), transformation(3,2), transformation(3,3);
108 
109  for(int i=0;i<laserCloud.points.size();i++)
110  {
111  Vector4d Point_in(laserCloud.points[i].x,laserCloud.points[i].y,laserCloud.points[i].z,1), Point_out;
112 
113  Point_out=Trans*Point_in;
114  laserCloud.points[i].x = Point_out(0);
115  laserCloud.points[i].y = Point_out(1);
116  laserCloud.points[i].z = Point_out(2);
117  }
118 
119  tf::Matrix3x3 T;
120  T.setValue(transformation(0,0),transformation(0,1),transformation(0,2),
121  transformation(1,0),transformation(1,1),transformation(1,2),
122  transformation(2,0),transformation(2,1),transformation(2,2));
123  tf::Quaternion q;
124  tfScalar yaw, pitch, roll;
125  T.getEulerYPR(yaw,pitch,roll);
126  double trans[3], euler[3];
127  trans[0]=transformation(0,3);
128  trans[1]=transformation(1,3);
129  trans[2]=transformation(2,3);
130  const char* name;
131 
132  if(laserNames=="lms1_ldmrs")
133  name="/calib_results/lms1_ldmrs_calib.txt";
134 
135  else if(laserNames=="lms1_sr")
136  name="/calib_results/lms1_sr_calib.txt";
137 
138  else if(laserNames=="lms1_stereo")
139  name="/calib_results/lms1_stereo_calib_.txt";
140 
141  else if(laserNames=="lms1_lms2")
142  name="/calib_results/lms1_lms2_calib.txt";
143 
144  string path = ros::package::getPath("calibration");
145  path=path+name;
146  const char *file_path = path.c_str();
147 
148  writeFile(transformation,file_path);
149  euler[0]= yaw; //yaw around Z axis
150  euler[1]=pitch; //pitch around Y axis
151  euler[2]=roll; //roll around X axis
152 
153  T.getRotation(q);
154 
155  laser.position.x=transformation(0,3);
156  laser.position.y=transformation(1,3);
157  laser.position.z=transformation(2,3);
158  laser.orientation.x=q[0];
159  laser.orientation.y=q[1];
160  laser.orientation.z=q[2];
161  laser.orientation.w=q[3];
162 }

171 int main(int argc, char **argv)
172 {
173  ros::init(argc, argv, "calibration");
174  ros::NodeHandle n;
175 
176  markers_pub = n.advertise<visualization_msgs::MarkerArray>( "/markers3", 10000);
177  //markers_pub = n.advertise<visualization_msgs::Marker>( "/markers3", 10000);
178 
179  CircleCentroids centroids;
180  bool colectPoints = true;
181  int count=0, change=0;
182  pcl::PointXYZ P[2];
183  P[1].x=0;
184  P[1].y=0;
185  P[1].z=0;
186 
187  cout<<"start";
188  cin.ignore();
189 
190 int times=0;
191 //while(times<2)
192 {
193  ldmrPointCloud.clear();
194  lms1PointCloud.clear();
195  lms2PointCloud.clear();
196  swissrangerCloud.clear();
197  camera1Cloud.clear();
198  colectPoints=true;
199  count=0;
200  cout<<"Start calibration"<<endl;
201  while(colectPoints)
202  {
203  if(centroids.lms1Centroid.point.x!=0 && centroids.lms2Centroid.point.x!=0 && centroids.ldmrsCentroid.point.x!=0 && centroids.cam1Centroid.point.z!=0)
204  {
205  P[0].x=centroids.lms1Centroid.point.x;
206  P[0].y=centroids.lms1Centroid.point.y;
207  P[0].z=centroids.lms1Centroid.point.z;
208 
209  double dist;
210  dist=sqrt(pow((P[0].x-P[1].x),2) + pow((P[0].y-P[1].y),2));
211  double time_diference;
212  time_diference = centroids.ldmrsCentroid.header.stamp.nsec - centroids.lms1Centroid.header.stamp.nsec;
213  //cout<<"time "<<time_diference<<endl;
214  if(dist>0.10)
215  {
216  double diff_dist_mean=0;
217  if(count>0)
218  {
219  double d_ldmrs, d_lms1, d_lms2, d_sr, d_stereo;
220  //calculation of the distance between the corrent center of the ball detected and the previous
221  d_ldmrs=sqrt(pow((ldmrPointCloud.points[count-1].x-centroids.ldmrsCentroid.point.x),2)+pow((ldmrPointCloud.points[count-1].y-centroids.ldmrsCentroid.point.y),2)+pow((ldmrPointCloud.points[count-1].z-centroids.ldmrsCentroid.point.z),2));
222  d_lms1=sqrt(pow((lms1PointCloud.points[count-1].x-centroids.lms1Centroid.point.x),2)+pow((lms1PointCloud.points[count-1].y-centroids.lms1Centroid.point.y),2)+pow((lms1PointCloud.points[count-1].z-centroids.lms1Centroid.point.z),2));
223  d_lms2=sqrt(pow((lms2PointCloud.points[count-1].x-centroids.lms2Centroid.point.x),2)+pow((lms2PointCloud.points[count-1].y-centroids.lms2Centroid.point.y),2)+pow((lms2PointCloud.points[count-1].z-centroids.lms2Centroid.point.z),2));
224  //d_sr=sqrt(pow((swissrangerCloud.points[count-1].x-centroids.swissrangerCentroid.point.x),2)+pow((swissrangerCloud.points[count-1].y-centroids.swissrangerCentroid.point.y),2)+pow((swissrangerCloud.points[count-1].z-centroids.swissrangerCentroid.point.z),2));
225  d_stereo=sqrt(pow((camera1Cloud.points[count-1].x-centroids.cam1Centroid.point.x),2)+pow((camera1Cloud.points[count-1].y-centroids.cam1Centroid.point.y),2)+pow((camera1Cloud.points[count-1].z-centroids.cam1Centroid.point.z),2));
226  int number_of_sensors = 3; //number of sensors to be calibrated (without counting the reference sensor)
227  diff_dist_mean=(pow((d_lms1-d_ldmrs),2)+pow((d_lms1-d_stereo),2)+pow((d_lms1-d_lms2),2))/number_of_sensors;
228  }
229 
230  if(diff_dist_mean<0.15)
231  {
232  pcl::PointXYZ p;
233  p.x=centroids.lms1Centroid.point.x;
234  p.y=centroids.lms1Centroid.point.y;
235  p.z=centroids.lms1Centroid.point.z;
236  lms1PointCloud.push_back(p);
237 
238  p.x=centroids.lms2Centroid.point.x;
239  p.y=centroids.lms2Centroid.point.y;
240  p.z=centroids.lms2Centroid.point.z;
241  lms2PointCloud.push_back(p);
242 
243  p.x=centroids.ldmrsCentroid.point.x;
244  p.y=centroids.ldmrsCentroid.point.y;
245  p.z=centroids.ldmrsCentroid.point.z;
246  ldmrPointCloud.push_back(p);
247 
248  p.x=centroids.swissrangerCentroid.point.x;
249  p.y=centroids.swissrangerCentroid.point.y;
250  p.z=centroids.swissrangerCentroid.point.z;
251  swissrangerCloud.push_back(p);
252 
253  p.x=centroids.cam1Centroid.point.x;
254  p.y=centroids.cam1Centroid.point.y;
255  p.z=centroids.cam1Centroid.point.z;
256  camera1Cloud.push_back(p);
257 
258  cout<<"count "<<count<<endl;
259 
260  cout<<"Press to select another point";
261  cin.ignore();
262  if(count==31)
263  colectPoints = false;
264  count++;
265  change=0;
266  }
267 
268  vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> > clouds;
269  clouds.push_back(lms1PointCloud);
270  clouds.push_back(lms2PointCloud);
271  clouds.push_back(ldmrPointCloud);
272  clouds.push_back(swissrangerCloud);
273  clouds.push_back(camera1Cloud);
274 
275  pcl::io::savePCDFileASCII("lms1.pcd", lms1PointCloud);
276  pcl::io::savePCDFileASCII("lms2.pcd", lms2PointCloud);
277  pcl::io::savePCDFileASCII("ldmrs.pcd", ldmrPointCloud);
278  pcl::io::savePCDFileASCII("stereo.pcd", camera1Cloud);
279 
280  vector<geometry_msgs::Pose> lasers;
281  lasers.push_back(laser_lms151_1);
282  lasers.push_back(laser_lms151_2);
283  lasers.push_back(laser_ldmrs);
284  lasers.push_back(swissranger);
285  lasers.push_back(stereo);
286 
287  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray targets_markers;
288  targets_markers.markers = createTargetMarkers(clouds,lasers);
289  markers_pub.publish(targets_markers);
290 
291 
292  }
293 
294  if(change==0)
295  {
296  P[1].x=centroids.lms1Centroid.point.x;
297  P[1].y=centroids.lms1Centroid.point.y;
298  P[1].z=centroids.lms1Centroid.point.z;
299  change=1;
300  }
301  }
302  ros::spinOnce();
303  }
304 
305  cout<<"Press Enter to Continue";
306  cin.ignore();
